name: Clyde
description: Clyde is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a vibrant red body resembling the color of a racing car, Clyde stands out among the rest. His box-like structure, known as rossoCorsa, adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to his appearance. The buttons on his body, shaped like cats, add a playful and whimsical element to his design. Clyde's arms and legs are also cat-shaped, allowing him to move gracefully and with agility. His screen, redBlack, displays data and graphics in a mesmerizing combination of red and black hues. To top it all off, Clyde wears a stylish pair of glasses, giving him an intellectual and inquisitive aura. With his unique combination of traits, Clyde is ready to assist the WebtrES club in their endeavors.
